metadata.title: Leg Avenue Women's 4 Piece Pin Up Kitty
features: Quality materials used for all Leg Avenue products
100% designed and tested for the toughest situations and environments
Whether you are a professional, recreational user, or even casual, Leg Avenue will fit the mold for all types of people
description: 2 piece red hot devil, includes spandex catsuit with mesh flame cut out detail, attached devil tail, and matching horn headband.
